mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owner (owner_id, owner_name, owner_pass, owner_number, bs_name, bs_number) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPass}, #{ownerNumber}, #{bsName}, #{bsNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE owner SET owner_pass = #{ownerPass}, owner_name = #{ownerName}, owner_number = #{ownerNumber}, bs_name = #{bsName}, bs_number = #{bsNumber} WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}
